name: Google Search - General Islamic Knowledge Search
description: Google Search can be used to find a wide variety of Islamic content from various websites. It's a general search tool, not a dedicated Islamic knowledge repository, but can be used to find hadith, fatwas, and other resources.

search.searchTips: Use relevant keywords and specific terms (e.g., 'hadith sahih bukhari', 'fatwa on fasting'). Use site: to restrict search to specific domains.

contentPage.description: Content pages can vary widely depending on the website. Google Search results link to external websites that contain the desired content.

title: h3.LC20lb.MBeuO.DKV0Md
extraction.contentNotes: Content will need to be extracted from the linked pages. Google Search itself does not provide content, only links.

aiNotes: Google Search results should be treated as links to external websites. The content and citation format will depend entirely on the linked sites. Verify the credibility of sources.
